channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple File List
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple File List

item.title: CVE-2023-1025|2024-08-02T05:32:46.453Z -- unknown -- simple%20file%20list
item.description: The Simple File List WordPress plugin before 6.0.10 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
